mapper.update: UPDATE reservation_tb SET reservation_status = '3' WHERE reserve_end_datetime <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND reservation_status = '1'
mapper.select: SELECT roption_no, roption_title, roption_price, roption_content, room_no FROM roomoption_tb where room_no = #{roomNo} and roption_delete = 'N'
SELECT roomimage_no, original_name, save_name, file_size, thumbnail, file_delete, upload_date FROM roomimage_tb WHERE room_no = #{roomNo} and file_delete = 'N' and thumbnail = 'Y'

SELECT roomimage_no, original_name, save_name, file_size, thumbnail, file_delete, upload_date FROM roomimage_tb WHERE room_no = #{roomNo} and file_delete = 'N' and thumbnail = 'N' ORDER BY upload_date DESC

select a.*, IFNULL(b.roptionimage_no, '0') as roptionimage_no, IFNULL(b.original_name, 'noImage') as original_name, IFNULL(b.save_name, 'noImage') as save_name, IFNULL(b.file_size, '0') as file_size, IFNULL(b.file_delete, 'N') as file_delete, IFNULL(b.upload_date, '0101-01-01') as upload_date FROM roomoption_tb a left join roomoptionimage_tb b on a.roption_no = b.roption_no WHERE a.room_no = #{roomNo}
